SEO_TITLE: ESLAND Awards 2024 - Celebrating the best of streaming and content creators
SEO_DESCRIPTION: Discover the best content creators from Spain, Latin America and Andorra. Vote for your favorites! Celebrate the innovation and talent of Twitch, YouTube and more
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_1: Cinema and music have their own awards, and now it's time for streaming and content creators to have their own awards too.
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_2: Spain, Latin America and Andorra united by creators and their communities, to remember and relive some of the best moments of the year.
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_3: After two galas, one at the Palau de la Música Catalana in Barcelona, and another at the National Auditorium in Mexico City, we are now waiting for the third edition in Andorra.
BENTO_TITLE_1: Andorra: the zenith of the ESLAND awards
BENTO_CONTENT_1: A new edition full of news and content, which will start several weeks before the long-awaited gala. Special live shows, collaborations, concerts and much more in what will be an authentic party dedicated to content creation.
BENTO_CONTENT_2: An awards ceremony full of top-notch content and many surprises, in which they will discover the winners of this third edition of the ESLAND Awards.
BENTO_CONTENT_3: This year, the moment of the blue carpet will be replaced and improved, thanks to the incredible Andorran landscapes, by a white carpet in the middle of the snow, located in the ski slopes of Andorra.
BENTO_CONTENT_4: This year, the reddit will not be part of the awards voting, but it will be part of the community. The official subreddit of the ESLAND Awards is open for you. Share your clips, opinions and interact with the entire community of Spanish-speaking streaming.
VIDEO_SUBTITLE: AWARDS TO THE SPANISH-SPEAKING STREAMING COMMUNITY
VIDEO_ALT: Esland - Awards to the Spanish-speaking Streaming community
PREFOOTER_VIDEO_TITLE: Guide to the 3rd Edition of the ESLAND Awards
